Title: Relates to death certificates for persons whose death is caused by any act or event in which alcohol is a factor
Summary: Provides that where a death is caused by any act or event in which alcohol is a factor, such information shall be indicated on the death certificate.
LawCode: Amd ยง4141, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to death certificates for persons whose death is caused by any act or event in which alcohol is a factor
